original: Connection pooling contains database collections so that the connection can be used or reused whenever there is a request to the database. This technique increases the performance of executing the database commands because there is no need to create a new connection.
result: Pooling of connections is a technique used to optimize the performance of accessing databases. This technique enhances the speed of executing database commands.
